content.rendered:
The heavy duty wire tensioner BD 450kg is a combination of a tensioner and an insulator all in one.

Features:

  • A hardy heavy duty tensioner for all weather types
  • Can tension up to a 2.5mm steel wires, making it very versatile
  • Recommended tensioning up to 120kg
  • It eliminates galvanic reaction between dissimilar metal thus eliminating rust and can be used with any type of wire
  • Material: UV stabilised glass filled nylon
  • Tension maximum: 120kg
  • Operating voltage: 0- 12KV
